'''Ash Wood''' is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down Ash Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Ash Trees can be found around the hot spring south of the [[Statue of The Seven]] in the [[Beryl Region]] and east of the [[Foggy Forest Path]] [[Teleport Waypoint]] in the [[Erinnyes Forest]],

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=524 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
